current.mlvedaACS_messageContent: <<shop.name>> process all orders in <<shop.currency>>. While the content of your cart is currently displayed in <<shop.selected_currency>>, you will checkout using <<shop.currency>> at the most current exchange rate.

settings.title: HEDGREN
settings.richtext: Hedgren began designing bags in 1993 with one simple philosophy in mind: make bags that serve the functional needs of everyday life, and make them look good while doing it. Over the years we’ve grown to realize that functionality isn’t determined by the number of compartments, or pockets, or zippers a bag has. Functionality is defined by the experience someone has while using our bags.

settings.code: Share your style with #Hedgren for a chance to get featured on our Instagram account @Hedgren_Global

settings.message_text:
Dear customers, we are currently moving our warehouse in Belgium to a new location in Antwerp.
This may cause some delays in the delivery of your orders. We apologize for this inconvenience which should only last a few days.
Thank you for your understanding.
The Hedgren team

settings.title: Share brand or product details
settings.text: Pair large text with an image to give focus to your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
